answers.question: Is your project a member or past grantee of one of these networks?

answers.answer:
Support Taiwan local Web3 Public Goods community and individuals.

1. Development of Hypercert Tools for Public Goods Verification with FAB DAO Hypercert lab team. Just kick off the discussion in Q2 2025. 


2. “FAB DAO Green Sofa” is honored to sponsor the g0v hackathon in May 2025! By effectively utilizing public funding raised from the global Web3 community, we aim to help bridge international and local resources in Taiwan. 
(https://x.com/GreenSofa_TW/status/1901609302852288930)

3. Through 1 on 1 interview, we follow up 18 Taiwan Public goods community and individuals.
(Ref: https://x.com/GreenSofa_TW/status/1866096968809984155)

Ref:
https://hackmd.io/@greensofa/home
https://gap.karmahq.xyz/project/greensofa
answers.question: What are your key active goals, plans, objectives or milestones for this year?

project.title: GreenPill Taiwan - Green Sofa
project.description:
About
Formosa Art Bank DAO (FAB DAO)

FAB DAO, also known as Formosa Art Bank DAO, is a self-governing organization for charity NFTs since 2021. The largest charity NFT fundraising project in Taiwan, the "Project Percentage, %", brought together cross-disciplinary organizations and individuals to create a new system and style in Taiwan NFT market that combines the theme of charity, art and culture.

https://opensea.io/collection/projectpercentage

FAB DAO focuses on minting and selling non-profit NFTs, creating artist and collector communities, building blockchain experiences and designing blockchain education for the public. With goodness and eternity as our starting point, we are building a connected Web3 metaverse. We will apply the good features of blockchain to take the real actions in the real world.

Background

As FAB DAO became formally DAO in April 2023, the core team handed over the management of FAB DAO to the communities. Different initiatives and ideas were raised and discussed within FAB DAO.

At the same time, Public Goods ecosystems grew under the support of Gitcoin and other organizations. As one of the pioneers in Public Goods, GreenPill would like to share its experience and develop local chapters for different cities over the world.

When two communities connected with each other, the idea of Taiwan Chapter was born.

Mission & Vision, Value alignment

Green Sofa aligns with the mission and vision of GreenPill, which is to build a global network society transcending national and cultural boundaries, while exporting regenerative digital infrastructure to the world.

As one team under FAB DAO, Green Sofa aims to explore the possiblity of collaboration wtih GreenPill international and FAB DAO. It is a school for FAB DAO learning from GreenPill about Public Goods, e.g. QF/QV, Gitcoin Grants Stack. It is also a laboratory for FAB DAO to apply the knowledge, kick off hands-on projects in smaller scale, to gain local experiences and feedback to FAB DAO and GreenPill.

Critical success factors

Increase awareness of the GreenPill and look for collaboration opportunity with FAB DAO

Learn and apply GreenPill related tools and knowledge to support FAB DAO development, e.g. QF/QV, Gitcoin Grants Stack, Hypercert.

Act as the communication channel between FAB DAO and GreenPill International and other local chapters.


Q1 2025

- We will interview 18 public goods communities and individuals and follow up their achievement since participating our 1st Grant is Great round. 

Bound and small grant will be allocated to support their development. 

https://x.com/GreenSofa_TW/status/1866096968809984155

- Mint GIVETH NFT to participate in GIVETH coming QF round
https://x.com/GreenSofa_TW/status/1861046543941243254

- Select 3rd steward: Swift Evo
https://x.com/GreenSofa_TW/status/1873892129371808180

2024 Summary:

Weekly Web meeting with FAB DAO Discord - GreenSofa channel

Regular update with GreenPill.network

Follow up “Grant is Great!” QF round on 2023 by survey and 1 on 1 discussion on Q1 2024

The 2nd grant as retroPGF format to reward Taiwan individual and commmunity for public goods

https://reportcards.gitcoin.co/10/0xe9459565709c5e856ffbc3cc8715824945d92de7

Achievement in 2024

2024-07:

Invite OP 中文力量 Marcus (Optimism_cn) update Optimism retroPGF 5, discuss GreenSofa easy retroPGF to GreenSofa.

2024-06:

GreenSofa first NFT on akaSwap platform on Tezos chain

https://www.akaswap.com/akaobj/25336

2024-03: Successfully raised funds on GreenPill x Octant Community Round, and we extend special thanks to the Octant community! (matching fund received: 0.27 ETH)

2024-01:

GIVETH approved Green Sofa

https://giveth.io/project/greensofa-greenpill-taiwan

AMA together with GreenPill Phangan on Regen Infrastructure: on the way to QF. Talk with GreenPill Taiwan

https://x.com/GreenPillKPG/status/1751048683343454443?s=20

Support Japan earthquake relief fund by GreenPill Japan - 0.09 ETH

https://x.com/GreenSofa_TW/status/1743773826364969072?s=20

Summary of previous work in 2023

Establish Green Sofa team under the structure of FAB DAO on 13 Sep 2023
https://x.com/GreenSofa_TW/status/1724018034275393878?s=20

By participating in the GreenPill round during GG19, we used the funding on

Initiate the follow-up project with “Grant is Great!” local QF round including 11 projects
https://hackmd.io/g53iKGlxRWaVaLEnL4OkFA

Support GreenPill Japan due to Japan earthquake - 0.09 ETH
https://x.com/GreenSofa_TW/status/1743773826364969072?s=20

FAB DAO participated in previous GG18 Web3 community and educational round and Global Chinese Community round. The combined matching funds is 1369.6 DAI. The funding is used to launch a local QF round, name as “Grant is Great!”.

We had

32 individuals participated in donating;

direct donation sum of $93.57 across 166 donations

13 communities and individual contributors in Public Goods sign up;

here is a recap:

https://mirror.xyz/mashbean.eth/KCq0spYlJ20Vle3Z_-qMucGt_oOsDovNNfcCd-Nad9M

QV project with 100 xtz on Tezos NFT collection from September - November 2023
